headline: What New Signals Are Shaping the Evolving Narrative for Federal Bank?
summary: Federal Bank’s latest analyst update keeps the consensus price target steady at ₹246.03, even as a slightly lower discount rate hints at reduced perceived risk and a more supportive macro backdrop. With revenue growth expectations and other core assumptions virtually unchanged, the revised narrative reflects balanced optimism on execution alongside caution that much of the good news may already be priced in. Read on to see how you can track these evolving analyst signals and stay ahead of...
